text:
@GOPLeader It’s obvious Nancy Pelosi colluded with China to spread the COVID-19
to America & the rest of the World! She wanted to destroy all the hard work President Trump did to cause America to have the Greatest Economy in our Nation’s history! She MUST be held accountable & removed ASAP!
